comment.body: ipfs on beaglebones? sounds like they got a handle on the ram consumption.
This so much..! I wish clementine wasn't such a weird dusty mess.

>  no way to properly sort genre->album or artist->album. 

You can do that a little in the library view by grouping them but in general i totally agree.. clementine is just hold together by ducktape and a defibrialtor shock now and then.

I had this crazy but disgusting idea last night, to use an old windows version  of iTunes through wine.. I Scratched it because of the horror and helplessness of the idea but it's getting more and more appealing...
